snippet: A man charged with killing six people in a series of shootings in the Kalamazoo area told investigators he was being controlled by an Uber app through his cellphone, police said Monday.
lead_paragraph: A man charged with killing six people in a series of shootings in the Kalamazoo area told investigators he was being controlled by an Uber app through his cellphone, police said Monday.

headline.main: Michigan: Driver Held in Killings Says Uber App Controlled Him
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Driver Held In Killings Says Uber App Controlled Him
